comment.author: 98338006@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/lifeart] www.youtube.com/watch?v=PVGUui9XdgI&feature=related this is the principle At the time of the photo, people had coal-stoves -but no coal. So you could use a burner with air coming from under the 'fuel'.
